column1: 4.1.4.3.2.1 Summary of evidence and recommendation for sacral nerve stimulation
Sacral nerve stimulation is more effective than continuation of failed conservative treatment for OAB/  UUI, but no sham controls have been used.
Sacral nerve stimulation is as effective as onabotA 200 U injection at 24 months.
In patients who have been implanted, 50% improvement of UUI is maintained in > 50% of patients   and 15% may remain cured at four years.
